page.title: 06BYFIELD FESTIVALS(SEPT-DEC)
page.content: IN OCTOBER THERE IS ANOTHER FESTIVAL.IT IS CALLED THE OLD TIME MUSIC HALL.THIS IS MORE OF AN ADULT SHOW AS YOUNG CHILDREN WOULD FIND IT BORING. NEVERTHELESS SOME OLDER CHILREN DO GO TO IT.IT COSTS BETWEEN 2 AND 3 POUNDS TO GET IN BUT FOR THIS YOU GET A FISH AND CHIP DINNER AT THE INTERVAL AND A DRINK AS WELL.ALTOGETHER IT IS A VERY PLEASANT NIGHT OUT AND IT IS A LOT CHEAPER THAN THE THEATRE.IN DECEMBER, THE SCHOOL PERFORMS ITS PLAYS.THE MAIN PLAY IS PERFORMED BY THE TOP 2 CLASSES BUT THE INFANTS AND LOWER JUNIORS PUT ONE ON AS WELL.IT COSTS 50P.TO GET IN TO SEE ALL OF THEM BUT THE TOP 2 CLASSES DO A SEPARATE PERFORMANCE FOR THE OVER-SIXTIES.LAST YEAR WE ACTED OUT PINNOCHIO,BASED ON THE FAMOUS BOOK.
